channel.title: Comments on: Rave: a Colombian Culinary Homecoming
channel.description: See Berlin through a lens of migration and difference

item.title: By: collidoscope berlin
item.dc:creator: collidoscope berlin
item.description:
In reply to <a href="http://collidoscopeberlin.local/2013/12/11/rave-a-colombian-culinary-homecoming/#comment-471">JuliGo</a>.
Thank you for the positive support - bringing the experience of difference and diversity closer is our aim, so nice to see that we are succeeding!
item.content:encoded:
In reply to JuliGo.

Thank you for the positive support – bringing the experience of difference and diversity closer is our aim, so nice to see that we are succeeding!

item.title: By: collidoscope berlin
item.dc:creator: collidoscope berlin
item.description:
In reply to <a href="http://collidoscopeberlin.local/2013/12/11/rave-a-colombian-culinary-homecoming/#comment-472">The Diplomatic Wife (@diplomaticwife)</a>.
Thanks :) Both Sophia and I are away for Christmas but let us meet in the New Year for sure!
item.content:encoded:
In reply to The Diplomatic Wife (@diplomaticwife).

Thanks ðŸ™‚ Both Sophia and I are away for Christmas but let us meet in the New Year for sure!

item.title: By: The Diplomatic Wife (@diplomaticwife)
item.dc:creator: The Diplomatic Wife (@diplomaticwife)
item.description: You write so beautifully K! Awww... thanks so much for the mention and the link love sweety! We loved chatting with you! If you are in town for Christmas, gluhwein soon?
item.content:encoded: You write so beautifully K! Awww… thanks so much for the mention and the link love sweety! We loved chatting with you! If you are in town for Christmas, gluhwein soon?

item.title: By: JuliGo
item.dc:creator: JuliGo
item.description: I love the richness of your language and how you bring us this experience closer.
item.content:encoded: I love the richness of your language and how you bring us this experience closer.
